contentList.content: Embrace the shadows with the Dark Cleric, a fallen beacon of celestial grace turned to darker powers. Wield necrotic energies, unleash auras of dread, and dominate the battlefield with dark, devastating spells.
This resource represents the dark power you wield, growing stronger as you embrace the shadows.
You gain resistance to necrotic damage, making you more resilient against dark energies.
You gain advantage on Stealth checks when in dim light, allowing you to blend into the shadows more effectively.
You emit an aura of necrotic energy that deals damage to enemies within a radius at the start of their turn.
When you hit with a spell, you heal for a percentage of the damage dealt, siphoning life from your enemies.
Your resistance to necrotic damage is enhanced, and you gain immunity to the frightened condition.
Your spells that deal necrotic damage are increased in potency, dealing additional damage to your foes.
You create an area of supernatural darkness that obscures vision, shrouding the battlefield in a veil of shadows.
